title: Chroma IP sale
body: Is there going to be a Chroma IP sale? Also will headmistress Fiora Chromas be buy able if there is a IP sale?

replies.body: I don't have any information on upcoming chroma sales currently, but any news on that will surely be announced on the Sales Page.  Per the [Chroma Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204475264-Chromas-Packs-FAQ), IP sales would only occur twice a year so be sure to bookmark the sales page for any news.  Keep a look out!
